ComicInfo.Title: Future-Shock!
ComicInfo.Summary: Future-Shock!: Spider-Man returns from 1692, but overshoots his time period and lands in the year 2019. He must fight Martians with Killraven before he is able to get back on the time platform.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:45:13. [Issue ID 29843]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Mary Jane Watson (hallucination),Witchslayer [Cotton Mather] (villain),Killraven [Jon Raven],Abraham Lincoln (cameo),Spider-Man [Peter Parker],Volcana Ash (hallucination),Green Goblin (hallucination, villain)
ComicInfo.Inker: Dave Hunt,Gil Kane,Mike Esposito,Mike Esposito,Dave Hunt
ComicInfo.Letterer: Dan Crespi,Gaspar Saladino,Jean Izzo,Gaspar Saladino,Jean Izzo
